title: ReactJS Shopping Cart
description: Developed a feature-rich Shopping Cart application in ReactJS and React Bootstrap. Utilized Context API and useReducer Hook for efficient state management. Integrated AWS Cognito for secure user authentication and authorization. Successfully deployed the application on AWS Cloudfront for optimal performance.

title: MERN Real-Time Voice Chat
description: Created a cutting-edge real-time voice chat app using the MERN stack, facilitating interactive user communication. Employed JWT-based authentication for secure access and WebSocket API for live communication. Integrated Twilio for enhanced voice capabilities. Leveraged Docker and AWS for seamless deployment and scalability.

title: Movieland - ReactJS Movie Search Application
description: Created a dynamic movie search app in ReactJS, utilizing the OMDB API for real-time movie data retrieval. Designed an engaging user interface featuring a search bar and interactive movie cards for seamless navigation.

title: WorkoutBuddy - MERN Workout Recorder App
description: Effortlessly track workouts with our MERN app. Add titles and reps with ease, supported by secure authentication and MongoDB Atlas integration. With robust authentication protocols, your data is kept secure, and our seamless integration with MongoDB Atlas ensures smooth performance for an optimized experience.
